GraphConfig.TenantId: <Put your Directory/Tenant ID here. You can find it from AzureAD under application overview>
GraphConfig.ClientSecret: <Add your client secrets value here when you create secret under Certificates & secrets>
GraphConfig.ClientId: <Add the application/client ID which can be found under application overview>
GraphConfig.Scopes: < Application scopes URL to load the predefined scopes use the url https://graph.microsoft.com/.default >
